comments:
I'm using M7 together with VE 200402091432, GEF 200402121128, EMF 200402091432
and  JRE 1.3.1_09. Every time I try to create a new visual class, I get two
error messages: 

1) Creation of element failed.
   org/eclipse/core/internal/plugins/IPluginVisitor

2) Error trying to set new file into editor
   Reason:
   Plug-in org.eclipse.jem.beaninfo was unable to load class
org.eclipse.jem.internal.beaninfo.adapters.BeaninfoNature.

I tried it with JRE 1.4.2 but got the same result.

The prereqs for that build of VE are for M5. That build does not work on M7. You
need to step up to I20040219 (plus get the GEF driver that I20040219 needs, see
the requirements list within the download page).

At this point in time since Eclipse,GEF,EMF, and VE are all in development stage
it is very important to not mix and match drivers. They are all interdependent
at this time. The download page for a VE build indicates which drivers of
Eclipse, GEF, and EMF it is compatible with. And it will probably not be
compatible with any other levels of drivers until the very end and everything is
stablized.

There are still problems with I20040219 but it works better.
M1 released, move all resolved to Verified, as prelude to closing.
M1 released, move all resolved/verified to Closed.
